price: 18. Мре soki boboyi, kaši mabota maye maleka liboso na bino basilaki mpe koboya. Na yango, motindami azali na eloko ya kosala te sé akomisa sango ya polele.
arabic: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُواْ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tukadhibū faqad kadhaba umamun min qablikum wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
